```{r, include=FALSE}

```

```{r}
#Data Exploration
w_df = w_p %>% 
  filter(student_g_p == "w")
#View(w_df)
m_df = w_p %>% 
  filter(student_g_p == "m")
#View(m_df)

#Calculating general propotions in man presenting and woman presenting students

prop_w = count(w_df)/(count(w_df)+count(m_df))
#prop_w
prop_m = count(m_df)/(count(w_df)+count(m_df))
#prop_m
prop_m
```
